job_tasks.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand business needs and translate them into technical guidance for new features.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand how new technical features affect existing business services and teams.

job_tasks.phrase: Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML
job_tasks.justification: This task involves setting up the necessary data infrastructure for AI/ML models, which is a precursor to model development and can involve feature engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions the application of generative AI, a key component of the Modeling category for GenAI.

job_tasks.phrase: Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
job_tasks.justification: Exploring new technologies and creating proof-of-concepts can involve testing and adapting models or generative techniques.
Mentioning LLMs and embedding models falls under the core technologies used for modeling tasks in GenAI.
RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and Agents are specific modeling techniques and architectures used with generative AI.
This broadly indicates software development focused on AI products.
This implies guiding the technical implementation and development of new features.

job_tasks.phrase: design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
job_tasks.justification: This is a core software development responsibility covering the full lifecycle of systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
job_tasks.justification: Documentation of designs and implementation is a standard software development practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
job_tasks.justification: Creating system and sequence diagrams are specific software development documentation tasks.
Developing and working with APIs is a fundamental part of software development.
Working with React for UI/UX is a front-end software development task.
Docker and Kubernetes are standard tools used in MLOps for containerization and orchestration of applications, including ML/GenAI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
job_tasks.justification: Cloud platforms like AWS and specific Azure services are essential for deploying and managing AI/GenAI applications in production, aligning with MLOps principles.
Messaging queues are often used in MLOps for asynchronous communication between different components of a deployed AI system.
GitHub is a platform used for code version control and CI/CD pipelines, which are integral to MLOps.

soft_skills.phrase: collaborate to build new AI centric products
work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them
Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements
Collaborate to identify new feature impacts
Collaborate with team to design, develop
Some knowledge and experience of AI / ML software engineering
Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization
Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building AI-centric products using generative AI, LLMs, RAG, and Agents. It also requires software development skills to build production-grade systems and integrate these technologies, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
